content: the next page place the bottom tip of the heart into the hole at the top of the meter and sew into place sew the wings on either side of the heart use white yarn to embroider a shine onto the heart use white yarn to embroider shines onto the left side of the meter 3 use brown yarn to embroider lines onto the right side of the meter 4 copyright © 2025 icrochetthings 7/7 copyright © 2025 icrochetthings
